comments:
Import and open SWTGrid.java from the code included in JVELAYT08.  Select the
Foo: label.  From the property sheet, expand the layoutData property and set the
horizontalAlignment property to FILL.  The exception below is written to .log. 
This isn't a problem with a source file written from scratch on linux, I suspect
it's a problem working with a file created on Windows.  The error can also be
caused by setting a property via the Customize layout window.

!SESSION Aug 30, 2004 16:26:31.548 ---------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=M200408250800
java.version=1.4.2_04
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_US

delimeters.
